dialogue.text: I didn't expect to be asked about that. I wouldn't consider myself to be the most fashionable person, but I do love all the cute clothes you can find all over Enzync!
The brand I love the most is called Soleil! They're based in New Togarashi, and they make some of the most comfy casual wear ever! Nearly half my wardrobe comes from them.
Even my headphones! They were made as a special collab between Soleil and the New Togarashi music and tech brand, Scoville. The perfect mix of comfy with perfect sound quality!
Another brand I LOVE is Sugarplum. Genuinely some of the cutest clothes I've ever seen. They've got there own store here in Main Street's Ensemble Mall.
The pastel colors their clothes come in are perfect for the summer, and they make super comfy pajamas too for when the sun goes down.
Sometimes, the brands here get real wild. Just yesterday we saw that new clothing line from Zest's Best, and it was baffling on the eyes.
No offence to any viewers who wear that brand, heh.
Zest's Best has some really nice looking stuff every now and then, but it feels like everything that they make is fit exclusively for supermodels.
Soleil and the other brands I shop actually come in plus sizes, or even just sizes that could fit an average person.
Those clothes are super limited too. It's never the same things from that brand each month.
I think what that Zest guy lacks in actual style, he makes up for in knowledge of exploiting people's FOMO and brand awareness.
Though that brand ain't even the most outrageous here in the city. That honor goes to Truffle's. Their prices on fancy suits are criminal.
It's no wonder it's the only brand you see that Showman guy wearing...
I should honestly spice up my wardrobe soon. I've been wearing the same stuff for years, now that I'm really thinking about it.
I wouldn't mind a little accessory for myself one day. Maybe a funny little hat... or a pair of dumb-looking shades.
